channel.title: Mystic and Illusionnist Rework v1.3
channel.description:
# [color=Lighblue]Mystic[/color]
[details="Abilities"]
* > **Passive 1:** Mind Network- Can speak with other players that have this passive in a separate chat at all times(day and night). You may see who else has this passive. You will keep this passive even if your class changes.
* > **Passive 2:** Vision - You will appear as "telepathy" to players in the Mind Network. Players in the mind network will not know who you are. You will keep this passive even if your class changes.
* > **Night Ability 1:** Conduit(Uses: Unlimited?) - Immediately grant your target the mind network passive.
* > **Night Ability 2:** Seance(Uses: 1) - Immediately send your target a message. You may edit this message at any time.
* > **Day Ability 1:** Hack(Uses: Unlimited)(could use a new name)- Immediately remove the Mind Network passive from your target. Can only target players with the Mind Network passive.
*> **Day Ability 2:** Telepathy(Uses: Unlimited) - Your messages, whispers, and accusations of treason will be anonymous for the rest of the day. You will appear as "Telepathy" to the court. This ability can be used multiple times in the same day. Select this ability while it is still active to disable it.
[/details]
# [color=Purple]Illusionist[/color]
[details="Abilities"] **Passive 1:**
* > **Passive 1:** Mind Network- Can speak with other players that have this passive in a separate chat at all times(day and night). You may see who else has this passive(this will be shown in a window that's the same as where you see other evil faction members). You will keep this passive even if your class changes.
* > **Passive 2:** Vision - You will appear as "telepathy" to players in the Mind Network. Players in the mind network will not be able to see who you are(you are not shown in the window). You will keep this passive even if your class changes.
* > **Night Ability 1:** Mind Warp(Uses: Unlimited) - Cause your target to receive incorrect feedback from their abilities. Receive their night feedback.
* > **Night Ability 2:** Conduit(Uses: Unlimited) - Immediately grant your target the mind network passive
* > **Day Ability 1:** Hack(Uses: Unlimited)(could use a new name) - Immediately remove the Mind Network passive from your target. Can only target players with the Mind Network passive.
* > **Day Ability 2:** Telepathy(Uses: Unlimited) - Your messages, whispers, and accusations of treason will be anonymous for the rest of the day. You will appear as "Telepathy" to the court. This ability can be used multiple times in the same day. Select this ability while it is still active to disable it.
[/details]
[details="Changelog"]
* 8/28/18: Created thread
* 8/28/18: Simplified spoilers
[details="Version 1.2"]
* Replaced Hypnotize with 2 uses of Conduit
[/details]
[details="Version 1.3"]
* Telepathy: Now lasts for the rest of the day and has unlimited uses
* Changed the wording of some abilities
* Updated the thread's appearance
[/details]
[/details]
* [Noble and Aristocrat Rework](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/noble-and-aristocrat-rework-v1/71943)

item.dc:creator: RHCube
item.description:
It isn’t that complicated, just a lot to read and some technical info. Mind network just serves as a separate chat. Conduit adds a player to the chat. Seance sends a message in the form of private notes. Hack removes a player from the chat. Vision causes you to appear as “Telepathy” to everyone in the Mind Network. Telepathy is the same as before, except it now works on votes and accusations.
